Before creating or editing, please follow these guidelines:
1.Use design tokens for style if they exist; otherwise, create new ones to match the theme.
2.Check for existing components and reuse them if they exist.
3.Avoid creating an .md file. Instead, provide the result as a short message in the prompt result.
4.Ensure code changes are minimal and focused on the task.
5.Test the code to ensure it works as expected.
6.Follow best practices of Atomic Design methodology
7.Develop the map by following the reference at https://maplibre.org/maplibre-gl-js/docs/API/
8.Develop the UI by following the reference at https://tailwindcss.com/docs/installation/using-vite
9.Develop the web application by following the reference at https://react.dev/reference/react
